Emerging growth company&#8194; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#8194;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#8201;8.01. Other Events. Alphabet Inc. Euro-Denominated Bond Offering On May&#160;6, 2025, Alphabet Inc. (&#8220;Alphabet&#8221;) closed its underwritten public offering of &#8364;1,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 2.500% notes due 2029 (the &#8220;2029 Notes&#8221;), &#8364;1,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 3.000% notes due 2033 (the &#8220;2033 Notes&#8221;), &#8364;1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 3.375% notes due 2037 (the &#8220;2037 Notes&#8221;), &#8364;1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 3.875% notes due 2045 (the &#8220;2045 Notes&#8221;) and &#8364;1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 4.000% notes due 2054 (the &#8220;2054 Notes&#8221; and collectively, the &#8220;Notes&#8221;) pursuant to Alphabet&#8217;s registration statement on Form S-3 (File No.&#160;333-286752). The Notes were issued pursuant to an Indenture (the &#8220;Indenture&#8221;), dated as of February&#160;12, 2016, between Alphabet and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., as trustee. The foregoing description of the Indenture is qualified in its entirety by the terms of such agreement, which is filed hereto as Exhibit 4.1 and incorporated herein by reference. The foregoing description of the Notes is qualified in its entirety by reference to the full text of the respective forms of the Notes filed hereto as Exhibit 4.2 with respect to the 2029 Notes, Exhibit 4.3 with respect to the 2033 Notes, Exhibit 4.4 with respect to the 2037 Notes, Exhibit 4.5 with respect to the 2045 Notes and Exhibit 4.6 with respect to the 2054 Notes, and each incorporated herein by reference. &#160; Item&#8201;9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits. &#160; Exhibit Number &#160;&#160; Description &#8199;4.1 &#160;&#160; Indenture, dated February&#160;12, 2016, between Alphabet Inc. and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., as trustee (incorporated by reference to Exhibit&#160;4.3 of Alphabet Inc.&#8217;s Registration Statement on Form S-3 filed on February&#160;12, 2016 (File No.&#160;333-209510) &#8199;4.2 &#160;&#160; Form of Global Note representing the Registrant&#8217;s 2.500% notes due 2029 &#8199;4.3 &#160;&#160; Form of Global Note representing the Registrant&#8217;s 3.000% notes due 2033 &#8199;4.4 &#160;&#160; Form of Global Note representing the Registrant&#8217;s 3.375% notes due 2037 &#8199;4.5 &#160;&#160; Form of Global Note representing the Registrant&#8217;s 3.875% notes due 2045 &#8199;4.6 &#160;&#160; Form of Global Note representing the Registrant&#8217;s 4.000% notes due 2054 &#8199;5.1 &#160;&#160; Opinion of Cleary Gottlieb Steen&#160;&amp; Hamilton LLP 23.1 &#160;&#160; Consent of Cleary Gottlieb Steen&#160;&amp; Hamilton LLP (included in Exhibit&#160;5.1) 104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document) SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &#160; &#160; &#160; ALPHABET INC.
